duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform electrical or mechanical solving to resolve problems in non-functioning electro-mechanical equipment used in the manufacturing process.
Dismantle, adjust, repair, and assemble equipment according to layout plans, blueprints, operating or repair manuals, rough sketches or drawings.
Use test and diagnostic equipment to perform checkouts.
Perform equipment modifications as advised by engineers.

education_certification.credential: Associates of Applied Science in Electronics Engineering Technology, Mechatronics, related field of study, or equivalent military experience.
Basic PC skills including MS Office.
Understanding of SPC principles and proper application.
AAS in Electronics, BS in EET (Preferred)
Prior experience as an equipment technician in the semiconductor industry (Preferred)
Prior knowledge of maintaining and solving semiconductor tools (Preferred)
